text: "Wildest Moments" is a song by British singer-songwriter Jessie Ware. It was for her debut album, Devotion. It was released in the United Kingdom on 29 June 2012. It was only available as a digital download. Since its release, "Wildest Moments" has received positive reviews and honors from music critics. The website, Pitchfork Media, gave the song its "Best New Music" award. In Belgium, the song was certified Gold for sales of 15,000 units. ==Chart performance== Chart (2012) Peak position Greece Digital Songs (Billboard) 3 UK Singles (Official Charts Company)ChartArchive - Jessie Ware - Wildest Moments(Link redirected to OCC website) 46 ==Release history== Region Date Format Label United Kingdom 29 June 2012iTunes - Music - Wildest Moments - Single by Jessie Ware Digital download Island Records == References == == Other websites == * Category:2012 songs
title: Wildest Moments
